group_1.textCenter: (I wonder...if these clothes are good enough.)
(I suppose everyone would be embarrassed if we @were in our uniforms...)

group_1.narration: Meeting place: @The maid cafe that Kumi works at! @What to bring: @Your chocolate and your gratitude for everyone!
And don't forget to dress in your @best motivational clothes! @I'll be waiting♪

group_1.textCenter: and here's some chocolate I made for the occasion...

group_1.textRight: Me toooo!

group_1.textCenter: ...The heck is this? @Are you starting a cosplay convention?
...I guess I'm the one stuck playing the straight man @here...
Could I ask each of you one by one...

group_1.textRight: Whenever I'm out and about looking for a scoop,
or making the newspaper, I always wear this outfit.
When you talk about clothes for being motivated, @this is the one for Ryou.

group_1.textLeft: Well, I guess I get what you mean.

group_1.textRight: Kumi's always been a maid, after all,
so to convey my kyun kyun feelings,
[chara:305302:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I thought I should wear a kyuun kyun outfit♪

group_1.textLeft: ...You...chose this place so you could wear that, @didn't you?

group_1.textRight: Ehehe.
| I thought that my combat form or @my swimsuit would satisfy the conditions, |
| but Iroha and Ui stopped me. |
| Nemu and Touka told me... |
| That this would be appropriate because a student's @purpose is to study. |
| So, I am wearing this. |

group_1.textLeft: I'm really grateful that you were stopped, Sakurako...

group_1.textRight: Motivational clothes...
I thought I would dress up for once...
But this is worrying me.

group_1.textLeft: You're okay, Shizuku, you didn't do anything wrong.

group_1.textRight: [chara:301950:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]EEHHH!?

group_1.textLeft: What's with the "eehh!?" That's my line!
Did you honestly come all the way here in that @getup!?

group_1.textRight: Nahh, I was wondering if I was going to make it,
so I thought I'd go and use a little bit of @Shizuku's magic,
but when I got to Shizuku's, it seemed that we had @already passed each other.

group_1.textLeft: Because you keep trying to use people for your @convenience...
So what you're telling me is you walked @outside in those clothes...

group_1.textRight: And then I saw Sakurako,
and thought "oh right, she's a member of our party @today,"
so I asked her to come with me!@[chara:301950:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301950:cheek_0][chara:301950:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:301950:motion_100][chara:301950:lipSynch_1]Right, Sakurako!?

group_1.textLeft: | Yes, I had heard about Ayaka from everyone, |
| but when we started walking together, @we got a lot of attention. |
...So, why are you wearing that outfit?

group_1.textRight: Mm? Because it's a motivational outfit?
And that means!
The outfit that gets the most laughs!
[chara:301950:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]IT'S NOOOT!?

group_1.textLeft: Seeing everyone's own idea of motivation, @Ryou thinks this is more interesting.

group_1.textRight: Uh-huh♪
Besides, Hinano also came in really cute clothes.
Yeah, it looks good on you.

group_1.textLeft: | You should always dress this way. |

group_1.textRight: Definitely, it looks great on you, Hinano.

group_1.textLeft: When you compliment me honestly like that,
you make me think I'm the one going crazy and @losing touch...
